Text: Thanks trialNerror, I love these rips.

Thanks for the up trialNerror!

"Amargosa Opera House" is on tonight.  I'd love to know your process for ripping and compressing.  BIG THANKS for removing the commercials!
My process?  Searching, reading, self-teaching; hence the name "trialNerror".
Some specifics would be nice.  What do you use to get the show on your PC?

A TV tuner card for the PC which records episodes in a MPEG format that many programs can convert to AVI; 2-pass encoding for optimal results.

OR

A VoD service (Video on Demand) with a DRM removal software.
